mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_sinker_topo_table (sinker_topo_id, sinker_name, ds_id, ds_name, schema_id, schema_name, table_id, table_name, description, update_time) values (#{sinkerTopoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sinkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schemaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, sinker_topo_id, sinker_name, ds_id, ds_name, schema_id, schema_name, table_id, table_name, description, update_time from t_sinker_topo_table where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, sinker_topo_id, sinker_name, ds_id, ds_name, schema_id, schema_name, table_id, table_name, description, update_time from t_sinker_topo_table
and ds_name like "%"#{dsName}"%" and schema_name like "%"#{schemaName}"%" and table_name like "%"#{tableName}"%" and sinker_name like "%"#{sinkerName}"%"

select tt.id, tt.sinker_topo_id, tt.sinker_name, t.ds_id, d.ds_name, t.schema_id, t.schema_name, t.id table_id, t.table_name, tt.description, tt.update_time from t_data_tables t join t_dbus_datasource d on t.ds_id = d.id left join t_sinker_topo_table tt on t.id = tt.table_id
t.schema_id = #{schemaId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sinker_topo_table(sinker_topo_id, sinker_name, ds_id, ds_name, schema_id, schema_name, table_id, table_name, description, update_time) values
(#{item.sinkerTopoId},#{item.sinkerName},#{item.dsId},#{item.dsName},#{item.schemaId},#{item.schemaName}, #{item.tableId},#{item.tableName},#{item.description},current_timestamp())
